title: Undefector

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of the game, you are given the abilities and attributes of a random role from an evil faction in the game other than a "head" role.

desc:
Post 2830
*You're telling me you betrayed your friends, joined a crime syndicate, gained years of experience in murder and deception, and now you're just coming right back like nothing happened?*
